name: Sequestration of property
text: §580-12  Sequestration of property.  All property within the State of a party to a matrimonial action may by order of the court be sequestered and applied to the payment of any allowance in such action by the court for the support and maintenance of either spouse or for the support, maintenance, and education of minor children, whether temporary or permanent, where service or notice has been effected by any of the methods set forth in section 580-3. [L 1967, c 60, pt of §1; HRS §580-12; am L 1974, c 65, pt of §2]
